headline: lululemon athletica inc. Announces Second Quarter Fiscal 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, August 21, 2025--lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ: LULU) today announced that its financial results for the second quarter fiscal 2025 will be released Thursday, September 4, 2025. The company will host a conference call at 4:30 p.m. Eastern time to discuss the financial results.

headline: Lululemon Athletica Stock Outlook: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: Lululemon has significantly underperformed the broader market over the past year, yet analysts remain cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
